reviews.review_msg: Simon is one of the best professors in the Economics department. Took Econ 334, 335 with him. His classes are very straightforward (other professors should learn from him!). He is great at communicating/teaching. Exams/marking is also straightforward and the assignments are genuinely helpful and doable. Very patient and overall amazing prof.

Simon is amazing! He is really clear with his grading guidelines and follows a really fair marking strategy. The class itself is assignment heavy, no final - still challenging but if you take the time to do the weekly assignment you should do great in the class. I took also 335 with him and he is still one of the best professors you will ever have.
Great prof, lecturers are at a great pace. Uses clear and concise language. One of my favourite prof's I've had in University

Kevin is an amazing professor. He always makes sure the students understand the material well. He is also available for extra help and is open to scheduling appointments to help students out with their doubts. He's always wearing a smile on his face which makes him easy to approach and talk to. The course itself is not to hard and you'll enjoy it.
Overall, fair course. You'll get what you put in. Wish marking criteria were a little more clear, especially for exams.

I love Kevin! He is so chill and helpful with his students. He just wants you to learn the material and very understanding. He helped me more than the TA. I hope he chooses better TAs, his teaching quality cant be matched easily but if you have him and a good TA, you will be successful
